MASTER_DATA.name: ChangeOwnershipRequest
MASTER_DATA.subject: Request to change device owner
MASTER_DATA.message:
Hi,

[USERNAME] has requested to change the owner for the below mentioned device from [FROMUSERNAME] to [TOUSERNAME].Please note changing device owner will wipe out previous ownerâ€™s email settings from the mobile device if already configured.

Device UId:[DEVICEUUID]
Device Type:[DEVICETYPE]

Thanks,
TruHub Support.

This is a system generated email. Please do not reply.

MASTER_DATA.name: ChangeOwnershipApproval
MASTER_DATA.subject: [APPROVED] Request to change device owner
MASTER_DATA.message:
Hi [FROMUSERNAME],

The site admin has approved your request to change device ownership. The device ownership has changed from [FROMUSERNAME] to [TOUSERNAME] for the below mentioned device. The new device owner [TOUSERNAME] can configure email settings on his/her mobile device by clicking the request for email access option in settings section of the TruHub native application.

Device Type:[DEVICETYPE]
Device UID: [DEVICEUID]

Thanks,
TruHub Support.

This is a system generated email. Please do not reply.

MASTER_DATA.name: ChangeOwnershipRejected
MASTER_DATA.subject: [Rejected] Request to change device owner
MASTER_DATA.message:

Device Type:[DEVICETYPE]
Device Id: [DEVICEUID]

TruHub Support.
